entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
